actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study relating to the Bartram in Louisiana.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to direct a study of the feasibility and desirability of designating the Bartram Trail, Louisiana, a National Scenic Trail.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study relating to the Bartram in Louisiana.
